name: In Balance
description:
Controls (Overworld):

  • Move: Arrow Keys or WASD (Left Stick)
  • Interact: Space Bar (A)

Controls (Battle):

  • Attacks: 
    • Air: A (Right Shoulder)
    • Water: W (Left Trigger)
    • Earth: E (Left Shoulder)
    • Fire: F (Right Trigger)
    • Electric: D (X or Y)
    • Physical: S (A orB)
  • Block: Z (A or B)
  • Select target: Arrow Keys (Left Stick)

Battle Instructions:

  • Different elemental attacks can be weak/strong against different enemy types. Experiment to find the weakness of each enemy!
  • Make sure to time attacks to when your player starts flashing!
  • Also, time blocks to about a second before an enemy's attack would land! Your player flashes red if you've missed the block and taken full damage.

Known bug(s):

  • Todo list doesn't reset when the game resets
  • Can walk out-of-bounds in your yard
